taskDescription: Which isomer would you expect to undergo E2 elimination faster, trans-1-bromo-4-tert-butylcyclohexane or cis-1-bromo-4-tert-butylcyclohexane? Draw each molecule in its more stable chair conformation, and explain your answer.
detailedSolution: Cis isomer reacts faster because the bromine is axial.
